DOC.brief_summary: To compare effectiveness ezetimibe/simvastatin 10/40 daily atorvastatin 80 daily reduce concentration ldl-c endpoint 6 week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Vytorin Treating Uncontrolled Lipids ( VyTUL ) Study ( 0653A-122 )
DOC.criteria: Greater 18 year age Treated least last 3 month daily dose atorvastatin 40 mg Existing coronary heart disease cholesterol > 4.0 mmol/l Uncontrolled diabetes Elevated liver function test Elevated creatine kinase ( ck ) Triglycerides ( tg ) > 4.5 mmol/l Drug alcohol dependency within 6 month prior visit 1 Woman receive hormonal therapy maintain stable dose regimen least 8 week willing continue regimen duration study Woman childbearing potential use acceptable method birth control Women pregnant breast feeding
